author: tmdguru500
title: Cool plane for some fun.
review:
I bought this plane set for my 7-year-old son since he loves planes, so in terms of building, it wasn't a problem for him. 

The set: Well I really like it. The minions are cool and the details (i.e. the toilet) really fun. And of course, my son could play with it afterward. 

What I liked about

- The plane and the pieces. 

- Easy to build and the plane is sturdy. Difficult to misplace pieces

What I thought could be better

- Some more minion pieces or parts for the aircraft. 

Overall, it's a cool set. Good fun. I think this is suitable for any child who likes planes.
